bhellabell: This is the first year of my adult life that I don't wish I was at Coachella and! I have been completely unphased by it since January. The disappointment in not spending my birthday weekend there (first weekend of beychella last year) may continue to sting for some years as I TOLD THESE FOLK "thas all I want all YEAR," lol. If I had better practiced self care through fall 2017 and winter 2017/18 I could have made it! Wellness begins 100% within and we cannot expect others to care for us at all, especially when we don't exhibit how it's meant to be done. THIS YEAR I spent my bday at the ER dentist having a root canal flushed which held Zero Excitement, as my friend Noted, but I knew that Long Term, it was my best choice and today I am happy for it. Congratulations on taking time for you, your joy and not being held captive by society's perspective of what that should look like to you or how you're meant to feel as you pursue such necessities for yourself. Kudos for having the strength, presence and wherewithal to share your lessons on your platform-- those inches, though. 😘 YASSSSS, ELAINE!💓🎉 #SisGotAStrongGrowthGame 💫🎍🙏🏾
